body:
Comment 2: 
Tried to reproduce but could not build gospeccy (following the instrucitions on
https://github.com/0xe2-0x9a-0x9b/gospeccy)


godefs -g perf src/types.c > src/types.6.go
src/types.c:17: error: 'PERF_TYPE_BREAKPOINT' undeclared here (not in a function)
src/types.c:58: error: 'PERF_COUNT_SW_ALIGNMENT_FAULTS' undeclared here (not in a
function)
src/types.c:59: error: 'PERF_COUNT_SW_EMULATION_FAULTS' undeclared here (not in a
function)

...

I would be grateful if you could provide a subset of your source that triggers the issue
and  that i could just build with 8g/8l by hand.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
